member.name: IDirectManipulationManager.RegisterHitTestTarget
member.summary: Registers a dedicated thread for hit testing.
member.param: The handle of the main app window (typically created from the UI thread).
The handle of the window in which hit testing is registered (should be created from the hit testing thread). Pass in nullptr to unregister a previously registered hit-test target.

summary.para: Provides access to all the Direct Manipulation features and APIs available to the client application.

This is the first COM object (the object factory) created by the application to retrieve other COM objects in the Direct Manipulation API surface. It also serves to activate and deactivate Direct Manipulation functionality on a per-HWND basis.
